mapper.select: select a.alarm_id as dAlarmId,a.device_id as dSerialNum,a.alarm_code as dAlarmCode, a.alarm_describe as dAlarmInfo,a.alarm_date as dAlarmTime, b.di_name as DEVNAME,c.node_id as DEVORGID,c.node_name as DEVORGNAME,'报警' ALARM_TYPE from iot_realalarm a,iot_deviceinfo b,iot_orgtreenode c where a.device_id = b.di_serialnum and (b.di_deactive < 1 or b.di_deactive is null) and b.di_nodeid = c.node_id union all select d.drerror_id as dAlarmId,d.drerror_devnum as dSerialNum,d.drerror_code as dAlarmCode, d.drerror_describe as dAlarmInfo,d.drerror_receivetime as dAlarmTime, b1.di_name as DEVNAME,c1.node_id as DEVORGID,c1.node_name as DEVORGNAME,'错误' ALARM_TYPE from iot_realerror d,iot_deviceinfo b1,iot_orgtreenode c1 where d.drerror_devnum = b1.di_serialnum and (b1.di_deactive < 1 or b1.di_deactive is null) and b1.di_nodeid = c1.node_id union all select e.droffline_id as dAlarmId,e.droffline_devnum as dSerialNum,'01' dAlarmCode, e.droffline_describe as dAlarmInfo,e.droffline_devreceivetime as dAlarmTime, b2.di_name as DEVNAME,c2.node_id as DEVORGID,c2.node_name as DEVORGNAME,'离线' ALARM_TYPE from iot_realoffline e,iot_deviceinfo b2,iot_orgtreenode c2 where e.droffline_devnum = b2.di_serialnum and (b2.di_deactive < 1 or b2.di_deactive is null) and b2.di_nodeid = c2.node_id order by dAlarmTime

select a.hisalarm_id as dAlarmId,a.device_id as dSerialNum,a.hisalarm_code as dAlarmCode, a.hisalarm_describe as dAlarmInfo,a.hisalarm_date as dAlarmTime, b.di_name as DEVNAME,c.node_id as DEVORGID,c.node_name as DEVORGNAME,'报警' ALARM_TYPE from iot_hisalarm a,iot_deviceinfo b,iot_orgtreenode c where a.device_id = b.di_serialnum and (b.di_deactive < 1 or b.di_deactive is null) and b.di_nodeid = c.node_id AND a.hisalarm_date BETWEEN to_date(#{sStartDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{sEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') union all select d.dherror_id as dAlarmId,d.dherror_devnum as dSerialNum,d.dherror_code as dAlarmCode, d.dherror_describe as dAlarmInfo,d.dherror_receivetime as dAlarmTime, b1.di_name as DEVNAME,c1.node_id as DEVORGID,c1.node_name as DEVORGNAME,'错误' ALARM_TYPE from iot_hiserror d,iot_deviceinfo b1,iot_orgtreenode c1 where d.dherror_devnum = b1.di_serialnum and (b1.di_deactive < 1 or b1.di_deactive is null) and b1.di_nodeid = c1.node_id AND d.dherror_receivetime BETWEEN to_date(#{sStartDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{sEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') union all select e.dhoffline_id as dAlarmId,e.dhoffline_devnum as dSerialNum,'01' dAlarmCode, e.dhoffline_describe as dAlarmInfo,e.dhoffline_devreceivetime as dAlarmTime, b2.di_name as DEVNAME,c2.node_id as DEVORGID,c2.node_name as DEVORGNAME,'离线' ALARM_TYPE from iot_hisoffline e,iot_deviceinfo b2,iot_orgtreenode c2 where e.dhoffline_devnum = b2.di_serialnum and (b2.di_deactive < 1 or b2.di_deactive is null) and b2.di_nodeid = c2.node_id AND e.dhoffline_devreceivetime BETWEEN to_date(#{sStartDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{sEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') order by dAlarmTime
